name: Civilian1Talk
_source: s;OldMan1;Have I told you how Caretaker Annetta rebuilt this temple?
s;OldMan1;It was a practical ruin when she found it.{w}{br}She began to rebuild it, but had no money.
s;Villager Girl;I know. And then she found-
s;OldMan1;Don't interrupt! And then she found a chest of gold.{w}{br}A freak landslide revealed an old bandit's stash.
s;OldMan1;The work of Lady Clotho herself!
s;Villager Girl;Grandpa, don't jump, you'll hurt yourself!
